title: ICE building Servo with 1.14.0-nightly (0491a2317 2016-11-08)

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
```
± RUST_BACKTRACE=1 ./mach build -d
   Compiling glutin_app v0.0.1 (file:///Users/nox/src/servo/ports/glutin)
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
```
